languages.text: "Когда гнев Вашей Светлости обрушится на виновных, можете не сомневаться — на Даргонусе не останется желающих повторить их судьбу".

traits.locale_text: "Когда гнев Вашей Светлости обрушится на виновных, можете не сомневаться — на Даргонусе не останется желающих повторить их судьбу".

languages.text: "Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."
languages.original_text: "Когда гнев Вашей Светлости обрушится на виновных, можете не сомневаться — на Даргонусе не останется желающих повторить их судьбу".

traits.locale_text: "Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."
"Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."
"Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."
"Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."
"Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."

languages.text: “毫无疑问，当大人您的怒火烧到那些罪犯身上时，达戈努斯不会有任何人想要与他们落得同样的下场。”
languages.original_text: "Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."

traits.locale_text: “毫无疑问，当大人您的怒火烧到那些罪犯身上时，达戈努斯不会有任何人想要与他们落得同样的下场。”

languages.text: «Una vez la furia mi{mf|lord|lady} recaiga sobre los culpables, no le quepa duda de que no habrá una sola alma en Dargonus dispuesta a compartir su destino».
languages.original_text: "Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez la furia mi{mf|lord|lady} recaiga sobre los culpables, no le quepa duda de que no habrá una sola alma en Dargonus dispuesta a compartir su destino».

languages.text: 「陛下の怒りが罪人に降りかかる様を見れば、同じ目に遭いたいと思うものはダルゴナスから一切いなくなるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下の怒りが罪人に降りかかる様を見れば、同じ目に遭いたいと思うものはダルゴナスから一切いなくなるでしょう」

languages.text: "Sobald der Zorn Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} über die Schuldigen hereinbricht, wird es ohne Zweifel keine Seele mehr auf Dargonus geben, die ihr Schicksal teilen möchte."
languages.original_text: "Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald der Zorn Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} über die Schuldigen hereinbricht, wird es ohne Zweifel keine Seele mehr auf Dargonus geben, die ihr Schicksal teilen möchte."

languages.text: « Une fois que les coupables auront subi votre fureur, je doute que qui que ce soit prenne le risque de partager leur sort. »
languages.original_text: "Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois que les coupables auront subi votre fureur, je doute que qui que ce soit prenne le risque de partager leur sort. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin gazabı suçluların üzerine bir çöksün, hiç şüpheniz olmasın ki Dargonus'ta onların akıbetini paylaşmak isteyen tek bir kişi bile kalmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Once Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s wrath descends upon the guilty, have no doubt — there won't be a soul on Dargonus willing to share their fate."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin gazabı suçluların üzerine çöktükten sonra hiç şüpheniz olmasın, Dargonus'ta onların akıbetini paylaşmak isteyen tek bir kişi bile kalmayacaktır."
